headline: Nvidia CEO Huang Spoke About AI and the U.K. Today. What It Means for the Stock.
summary: Nvidia  stock was rising to start the week, but several potential catalysts are looming as key events take place across the Atlantic.  Nvidia shares rose 2% to $144.51 in Monday trading after a 1.2% gain Friday.  CEO Jensen Huang delivered the opening keynote speech at London Tech Week early Monday alongside U.K. Prime Minister Keir Starmer, pledging investments into the U.K. AI ecosystem.

headline: Qualcomm buys Alphawave, Nvidia CEO talks AI in the UK, eVTOL stocks jump
summary: Here are some of the trending stocks on Monday, June 9. Qualcomm (QCOM) is acquiring Alphawave Semi (AWE.L) for about $2.4 billion. Nvidia (NVDA) CEO Jensen Huang says he plans to invest in the United Kingdom, saying it's a "Goldilocks" situation for AI. Shares of Joby Aviation (JOBY) and Archer Aviation (ACHR) are jumping after President trump signed an executive order that will help boost electric vertical take-off and landing (eVTOL) development and approval. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.

headline: Qualcomm Bets $2.4 Billion On Alphawave To Power AI Data Centers
summary: Qualcomm Inc (NASDAQ:QCOM) announced on Monday that it has agreed to acquire semiconductor company Alphawave IP Group Plc for approximately $2.4 billion in cash. The purchase price implies 183 pence per share for Alphawave, implying close to a 96% premium to the price immediately before Qualcomm disclosed its interest in the company. The acquisition of Alphawave Semi aims to further accelerate, and provide key assets for, Qualcomm’s expansion into data centers. Qualcomm Oryon CPU and Hexagon NPU

headline: Qualcomm to Acquire Alphawave Semi
summary: LONDON, June 09, 2025--Qualcomm Incorporated (NASDAQ: QCOM) today announced that it has reached an agreement with Alphawave IP Group plc (AWE.L) ("Alphawave Semi") regarding the terms and conditions of a recommended acquisition by Aqua Acquisition Sub LLC, an indirect wholly-owned subsidiary of Qualcomm Incorporated, for the entire issued and to be issued ordinary share capital of Alphawave Semi at an implied enterprise value of approximately US$2.4 billion.

raw.headline: Qualcomm to Acquire Alphawave Semi
raw.summary: LONDON, June 09, 2025--Qualcomm Incorporated (NASDAQ: QCOM) today announced that it has reached an agreement with Alphawave IP Group plc (AWE.L) ("Alphawave Semi") regarding the terms and conditions of a recommended acquisition by Aqua Acquisition Sub LLC, an indirect wholly-owned subsidiary of Qualcomm Incorporated, for the entire issued and to be issued ordinary share capital of Alphawave Semi at an implied enterprise value of approximately US$2.4 billion.
